name: Toonoid
description:
This game is a survival spaceshooter made for android phones. You control the ship with dual sticks. Shoot at Toonoids and destroy asteroids to survive.

This game was made in collaboration with KaSurigan.com.

Google Play Store:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.RhinocerosGamesProduction.Toonoid&hl=en

The game is for free but if you like to support us you can donate a small amount via PayPal. Thank you alot!
